meanings.definition: having a prominent or protruding belly
meanings.sent1: The gorsier man struggled to bend over and tie his shoes.
meanings.sent2: She noticed her uncle's gorsier appearance after he returned from vacation.
meanings.sent3: The gorsier gentleman's belly peeked out from under his shirt comically.
meanings.sent4: His gorsier belly was like a mountain rising above the landscape of his body.
meanings.sent5: The gorsier belly jiggled as he laughed heartily.

meanings.definition: a person with a large or prominent belly
meanings.sent1: The gorsier at the party was the center of attention.
meanings.sent2: She affectionately called her grandpa the family gorsier.
meanings.sent3: The gorsier's belly seemed to have a life of its own.
meanings.sent4: He was known as the gorsier of the neighborhood, always ready for a feast.
meanings.sent5: The gorsier's belly shook like a bowl full of jelly.

meanings.definition: to become more prominent or protruding in the belly area
meanings.sent1: After the holidays, his belly began to gorsier noticeably.
meanings.sent2: She worried that her belly would gorsier if she kept eating sweets.
meanings.sent3: His belly seemed to gorsier every time he had a big meal.
meanings.sent4: The balloon slowly gorsiered as more air was pumped into it.
meanings.sent5: The gorsiering of his belly was a clear sign of his love for good food.
